title: Kerplunk! Raptors Jurassic World [Amazon Exclusive]
features: The KerPlunk Raptors Game is so easy to learn and fun to play that both parents and kids will love it!
Game's cool dinosaur theme makes it even more fun for fans of Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom!
Create a web of sticks and place the raptors inside the tree.
Then roll the die and take turns removing one stick at a time—whichever color stick the die indicates.
Don't let the raptors fall down the enclosure on your turn or you'll have to add them to your pile!
Special mode of play includes the character, Blue Can you be the first player to rescue Blue from the silo
The player to drop the fewest raptors wins. Perfect for kids of any age no instruction reading required!
description: KerPlunk is a beloved family favorite, and now you can play it with a cool look and a dinosaur theme based on the exciting new movie, Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom! This game of skill and touch is so easy to learn and fun to play that kids will love it! The object is to not let any raptors fall down the enclosure during your turn. Create a web of colored sticks across the tree and place the raptors inside the enclosure. Then roll the die and take turns removing one stick at a time—whichever color stick the die indicates. Be careful because one false move will cause raptors to fall and then you have to add them to your pile! The player to drop the fewest raptors wins! And there’s a special game mode based on the character, Blue! Will you be the first player to rescue Blue from the silo As no reading is required to play, the KerPlunk Raptors Game is perfect for younger kids. Game comes with 1 bright yellow, translucent plastic palm tree so you can see the raptors wriggle as you try to catch their tails on plastic sticks. Also included are 30 raptors, 30 multiple colored sticks, and a special die. For 2 to 4 players. Colors and decorations may vary.
